articles.title: Trade tensions hang over Trump's Asia trip, but he still aims to make a deal - NPR
articles.description: President Trump plans to attend a summit in Malaysia before meeting the new Japanese prime minister in Tokyo and talking to Chinese President Xi Jinping in Korea.
articles.content:
President Trump is headed to Asia for a nearly week-long trip that is scheduled to include a high-stakes meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the APEC summit in Korea.
The trip… [+5012 chars]
